volunteer_experience.info: Toolbox India (TBXI) works as an intermediary platform matching volunteersâ€™ expertise to capacity building needs of non-profits, toolbox INDIA supports organizations in the definition of their objectives and optimizing their existing resources by leveraging and honing the skills of corporate volunteersWork pro bono to partner with NGOs and work on individual projects.

volunteer_experience.info:
In India, a staggering 200,000 people die each year due to inadequate access to clean drinking water, while India generates ~61bn liters of sewage every day. Social Awareness and Newer Alternatives (SANA) is working to convert sewage water to W.H.O. standard clean drinking water using solar-powered compact water purifying stations. Worked in a team of 5 to raise 370,000INR via the Goldman Sachs Gives initiative - Analyst Impact Fund 2019, contributing to the Waste to Wealth projects atâ€¦
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          In India, a staggering 200,000 people die each year due to inadequate access to clean drinking water, while India generates ~61bn liters of sewage every day. Social Awareness and Newer Alternatives (SANA) is working to convert sewage water to W.H.O. standard clean drinking water using solar-powered compact water purifying stations. Worked in a team of 5 to raise 370,000INR via the Goldman Sachs Gives initiative - Analyst Impact Fund 2019, contributing to the Waste to Wealth projects at SANA, which cater to the drinking water needs of over 70,000 people annually
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Social Awareness and Newer Alternatives (SANA)
volunteer_experience.title: Impact Fund Volunteer

volunteer_experience.info: In my first year, I was part of the Support Crew for a team that raised 110,000INR to contribute to the Oxfam Fund dedicated to working on Youth and Active Citizenship, Economic Justice, and Gender Justice. Committed to work on my fitness and join the main team in the subsequent year to complete the 100km trail walk myself.In my second year, completed a 100km trailwalk and raised over 500,000INR to support the cause.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Oxfam
volunteer_experience.title: Trailwalker, Fund Raiser and Support Crew
